effect.sun-moon: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.

short_effect.sun-moon: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
